channel.title: SigNoz
channel.description: SigNoz is an open-source observability tool powered by OpenTelemetry. Get APM, logs, traces, metrics, exceptions, & alerts in a single tool.

item.title: What are Cloudwatch Metrics? How to implement Custom Metrics in Cloudwatch?
item.description: CloudWatch metrics play a critical role in monitoring AWS resources and facilitating effective troubleshooting during system failures. In this guide, learn everything about Cloudwatch metrics, its types, custom metrics and...
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Top 10 AWS Monitoring Tools in 2025 â€” Native & Third-Party Compared
item.description: Confused between AWS CloudWatch, X-Ray, and third-party tools like SigNoz or Datadog? Discover the top 10 AWS monitoring tools in 2025 to boost performance, security, and visibility across cloud workloads.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Essential Guide to AWS Lambda Monitoring - Best Practices
item.description: Master AWS Lambda monitoring with this comprehensive guide. Learn key metrics, best practices, and tools to optimize performance and costs.
